item.description:
Community Ice Skating @ Kendall Square is a seasonal outdoor ice skating rink located in the heart of Kendall Square off of 3rd Street. The rink offers skate rentals, lessons, private rink rentals, and a cafe serving hot drinks and snacks. ref: http://kendallsquare.org/play/details/community-ice-skating

It's usually $13 per person usually but google offers allows 2 people for $13.

https://www.google.com/offers/ppo/SELF/OLM3SRQL7JTJPV2H?loc=fb29348b9f2c0df0&utm_source=ppo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=dailyppo&utm_content=primary&targeting=AJmZVmcJFMgDj5hVfgGYE0...

We can get food later at Aceituna http://www.aceitunacafe.com/
And/or bubble tea at Leisure Station http://www.leisurestation.net/

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Ice Skating at Kendall Sq
